thread.title: Andy Jackson

author: Andy Jackson
title: Andy Jackson
text:
I was recommended by friends to try tyresonthedrive.com and i have been left really impressed with both the service received and the value.
I discovered a flat tyre one morning so made a booking for 3 new tyres as 2 others were in urgent need of looking at and booked it in for anytime the followin day. 3 new tyres and fitting (free as i bought more than 2 tyres) cost me Â£121.
I received an email the morning of the apointment with a 2 hour visiting window and the guy who came to fit my tyres called me 30 minutes before my appointment to advise he would be with me shortly.
My tyres were fitted inside 1 hour and he even pumped my other tyre up so it matched up with the other 3 for balance. It is rare for me to feel obliged to priase such good service but I was so impressed i felt i needed let people know how good they are!
